attributes.review: I downloaded this app with super high hopes for the future of our country but when I opened it, the first thing it asked me was to access my photos. I thought it was alright so I allowed it. 3 minutes later I get a notification that my phone is out of storage. I check my camera roll to see my photos being taken up by the same image- Trump’s face photoshopped onto a cheddar cheese block and making a weird face like he has explosive diarrhea and the caption “Make America Grate Again.” He was also wearing MLG sunglasses. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IF YOU DO NOT WANT A VIRUS
attributes.title: My phone has a virus??

attributes.review: This app is horrible. Trump is a racist bigot only caring about his white supporters. That’s not what I want in my president. He ordered military guardsmen to fire upon a crowd of innocent bystanders. Even medical professionals. Being a veteran, I was taught that it IS a war crime to shoot at medics. I do not support a war monger. I honestly don’t know why he is even still trying to go for the presidency when he is supposed to be charged for war crimes. I have never seen such division in a country caused by a president. That’s not a president. That’s pure evil. I am not interested in politics but only in to help the POC community be safe.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This app is literally the worst app I have ever downloaded. First of all, I opened the app just to find an orange dusty Cheeto man. I try and access the app and it glitched non stop. I tried to see when the next rally was but it was then that I realized that I actually could care less. This app is so bad that I couldn’t help but delete it. The software is terrible, the app itself is horrid, the guy representing the app is even nastier, and I can’t believe that this app is actually out there for people to download! It’s awful. Worst app that I have ever downloaded on my phone.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: So i got this app because i like trump and i thought i could support him but then when i opened the app it glitched and i had fairy emojis all over my phone and let me tell you i am terrified of fairies. terrified. and so i decided to delete the app to maybe help stop the fairies from appearing but they were still popping up. I asked my friend who also likes trump and got the app and she told me it put orange dots all over her phone! and she is so scared of orange dots. So long story short don’t get this app! It will put your worst nightmare in emojis on your phone!😓😓🧚🧚🧚😭😭😭
attributes.title: I was so scared!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting some nice quality freedom and all I got was this overgrown looking carrot with his fist up. Just gross and so #nasty. It proceeded to ask me for my PHONE NUMBER! WHAT IN TARNATION?! ABSOLUTELY NO RESPECT FOR PRIVACY! After seeing this I immediately felt sick. The light amount of gray filter over the photo made me nauseas. They should think before they create an “accessible app”. Some of us just can’t stand it. I would never buy again. If I was forced to recommend this app I would NOT! Even to my worse enemy unless I was having a #bad day. Kids these days MY GOLLY!
attributes.title: Literally a piece of garbage

attributes.review: upon opening the app my phone immediately started emitting what i HOPE was some sort of steam, and it became completely unresponsive for a couple days. once i could get it to turn on again, i tried deleting the app so that this wouldn't be an issue anymore. for some reason there's no physical way to delete it? would love some help on this. my kids have a terrible fear of this man and hate to see the popups of his face while playing angry birds. this app is very violating and is NOT worth your time. would rate zero if i could.
attributes.title: so many issues.

attributes.review: when that rotten old orange 🍊 popped up it almost gave me a heart attack 😠😠 not cool I do not recommend downloading this app, it will definitely give you quite a fright 😨. And on top of everything the scary orange 🍊 man 👨‍🦰 ASKS ME WHERE I LIVE like invasion of privacy much 😤. Sounds like this old rotten orange is quite the stalker 🤢. And tell me why the annoying orange 🍊 texted me saying “meet president trump” like that is so messed up I am very much offended, they expect me to pay for my own flight knowing how poor I am 😪. But above all this app is trash 🗑🌝.  scaring me like that✋ that’s not very legitness of you dAwg.
attributes.title: OLD ORANGE MAN 🍊

attributes.review: I opened the app and expected a normal page to  show. but instead, i received horrifying, graphic nudes from our cheeto man “the president.” i am scared to say the least. i had to see that little ball getting a SPRAY TAN! i would formally like to request that this disgraceful app be removed from all app stores. our so called “president” is trying to promote nudes on his app. my kids are not going to stand for a man like that in the country. i am taking this to the white house to press charges. this gross, ugly and clearly non packing cheeto man does NOT deserve to “lead this country!!!! i am so outraged. 😤😡😡😡🤬😑
attributes.title: I am DISGUSTED! 😡

attributes.review: I was displeased by the way Cheeto’s are now using there brand. I opened the app in disgust to find the new Cheeto mascot. I looked in horror as I saw what they have done to the chips. I showed the picture to my friends and their hearts stopped in horror. They are in the hospital as we speak. I am disgusted with this app and it’s not a good one. My eyes feel terrible now that I’ve seen what I’ve seen. The doctors say I might go blind from to much orangeyness. Im stuuuuring to right these now as i spweak. Them say i mwight need glasses. Please if you value your eyes do not download this app its not worth it.
attributes.title: Too much orange 🤢

attributes.review:
when i opened this app there was a discussing photo of a cheeto puff not even a good one it looks like the one that you leave in the bag for a week and forgot about it then ten years later your kids open the bag and ask you why it looks like that and you have to burn it because it was starting to move also i am pretty sure that this app is a front for a CULT most people on this app have flags and appeal that have this cheetos face and name on them like who does that?!?! anny way i have to go back to hanging my pride flag all love,

                          🏳️‍🌈💖Mike Pence🏳️‍🌈💖
attributes.title: haha. no❤️
